itemdesc-slingpouch-waist-*: Can hold sling bullets and sling. Press 'R' to select sling from pouch.
itemdesc-saydak-waist-*: Can hold arrows and bow. Press 'R' to select bow from case.
itemdesc-sheath-*-blackguardsword: Can store black guard sword. Press 'R' to select sword from sheath.
itemdesc-sheath-*-forlornsword: Can store forlorn sword. Press 'R' to select sword from sheath.
